column4: Latest;SIEM REAP: The Police force of the Forestry Administration
column5: in collaboration with the  Administration of Banteay Srey
column6: stopped a car transporting wildlife at 15:30 pm on December 24
column7: 2018.------The owner of the car remains unidentified
column8: as he fled after being pulled over by police.------ 478 kg of turtles and 219 kilograms of other animals
column10: were handed over to Banteay Srey forestry administration officials. The officials confirm that the wildlife will be released in the Tonle Sap Lake. ------https://kohsantepheapdaily.com.kh/article/754929.html------
